text: Cease Fire (Persian:آتش‌بس, romanized: Atashbas) is a 2006 Iranian romantic comedy movie directed by Tahmineh Milani and starring Atila Pesyani, Mohammad Reza Golzar, Mahnaz Afshar, Ahmad Mehranfar, Kaykavous Yakide. ==Other websites== * Category:2006 romantic comedy movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Tahmineh Milani
title: Cease Fire (2006 movie)
